sparkle.translation[0].definitions[0].de: to shine in small bright flashes
sparkle.translation[0].definitions[0].ex: The sea sparkled in the sun.
sparkle.translation[0].definitions[1].de: if someone’s eyes sparkle, they seem to shine brightly, especially because the person is happy or excited
sparkle.translation[1].definitions[0].de: a bright shiny appearance, with small points of flashing light
sparkle.translation[1].definitions[1].de: a quality that makes something or someone seem interesting and full of life
sparkle.translation[1].definitions[1].ex: the sparkle and zest of a live performance
sparkle.translation[1].definitions[2].de: if someone has a sparkle in their eyes, their eyes seem to shine, and you can see a feeling in them, especially happiness or excitement
sparkle.translation[1].definitions[2].ex: There was a sparkle of fun in her brown eyes.
